title: George Benson - Weekend in LA (live) 1978 TQMP [FLAC]
description:
George Benson - Weekend In LA 1978 (Recorded Live)

"I never paid much attention of George Benson at the time he was a genuine superstar in the smoothjazz style. I recall it being played on studentparties from my friends, but to my ears it sounded way too soft in those days.

Then again, I was so full of testosteron in my late teens that anything less heavy than Led Zeppelin, Van Halen or The Mahavishnu Orchestra I regarded as being girly music :)

As they say, wisdom and taste develop throught the years, so i gave it a second change and behold:  while many popjazz or jazzfunk outfits from the seventies sound quite corny nowadays this album has seriously stood the test of time. His guitar playing is just awesome and his supertight playing band really raises the spirits.

Highly recommended by Breezin Himself ;) 

Tracklisting
01.	Weekend In LA
02.	On Broadway
03.	Down Here On The Ground
04.	California PM
05.	The Greatest Love Of All
06.	It's All In The Game
07.	Windsong
08.	Ode To A Kudu
09.	Lady Blue
10.	We All Remember Wes
11.	We As Love

Brought to you by TQMP. (The Quality Music Project)

In this project me and my fellow pirates share only quality items out of our CD collections in lossless FLAC and include covers, especially for those who like to burn and print and put it in a nice and shiny jewelcase. Well, you all know the drill :)

Ripped by Exact Audio Copy V0.99 from 01-23-2008, encoded to FLAC with 1024kb/s
